title: SET_WIND_SPEED
content:
0xEE09ECEDBABE47FC0x45705F94// SetWindSpeed
void SET_WIND_SPEED(float speed);Parameters:speed: wind speed in meters per secondUsing this native will clamp the wind speed value to a range of 0.0 - 12.0. The wind speed will stay persistent until it is reset (see examples).Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Sets the wind speed to 0 meters per second
SetWind(0)

-- Sets the wind to 11.99 m/s
SetWind(11.99)

-- Allows the game dynamically change the wind speed again
SetWind(-1)
codeBlocks:
-- Sets the wind speed to 0 meters per second
SetWind(0)

-- Sets the wind to 11.99 m/s
SetWind(11.99)

-- Allows the game dynamically change the wind speed again
SetWind(-1)
